duties_responsibilities.duty: Assemble and serve meals in accordance with department standards
Complete daily responsibilities including meal assembly, cold food preparation, utility functions, and sanitation duties
Cleans and sanitizes food equipment, food contact surfaces, and food delivery carts
Make deliveries to the proper location at patient mealtimes, including taking meals to patients who have been transferred
Verify patient’s menu to patient’s name when serving a meal
Prepare food according to daily menu and production sheets, including salads, sandwiches, and desserts
Assist in dish room and follow proper ware washing procedures
Adhere to food service handlers’ regulations by wearing clean uniforms, gloves, and hat/hairnets while working with food and food equipment
